snippet.title: MOBILE LAUNCH TRAILER - MixMob: Racer 1
snippet.description:
Dive into LFG City in MixMob: Racer 1 Season 1!

Experience the world’s first-ever card battle racing game with MixMob: Racer 1. This season, the streets of LFG City, once a vibrant hub, now stand as the epicenter of our resistance against the rogue AI, HELIX-9. Compete in tournaments for glory and rewards on your journey to save humanity.

Unleash the power of your LFG City Masks and MixBots in a city transformed by street art. Every race, every knockout, and every victory tells a story of style and reclaimed freedom. Join the MixMob and race to reclaim what we’ve lost. This is where we fight back. This is where we make our stand.

Start racing in Free PvP now and make your mark on the streets of LFG City!

Start racing in Free PVP now! https://uprising.mixmob.io
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MixMobOrigin
Join our community: https://discord.gg/mixmob
